column1: # webanno.custom.Events | Events # webanno.custom.Participants | Participant # webanno.custom.Corefchains | Coref | AttachTo=webanno.custom.Participants
#text=It is Saturday morning and my mother wakes me early .
#text=My mother likes to shop by the week .
#text=As we walk in we get a shopping cart and start down the 1st aisle .
#text=Fruits and vegetables all stacked neatly in shelves .
#text=Potatoes in bags stacked next to the onions .
#text=I love the colors and the shapes .
#text=Here you can find some stuff I have never seen before .
#text=Star fruit , miniature bananas and blood oranges .
#text=We spend most of our time here .
#text=We are vegetarians so we do not go to the meat counter or the dairy aisle .
#text=We do go to the cereal aisle and I beg my mother every week for a different cereal treat .
#text=Sometimes she says yes and others no .
#text=But this week is yes and Frosted Flakes get tossed in the cart with delight .
#text=I am so excited about this that I do not pay much attention to the rest of the trip .
#text=I help my mom bag the groceries and put the bags in the trunk of the car .
#text=When we get home it all unloaded and put away and then it is time for some Frosted Flake goodness .
